present.english: The creative writer imagines the bright future
The smart scientists imagine the distant planet

imperfect.english: I was imagining the amazing story
The creative writer was imagining the bright future
The smart scientists were imagining the distant planet

future.english: I will imagine the amazing story
The creative writer will imagine the bright future
The smart scientists will imagine the distant planet

aorist.english: The creative writer imagined the bright future
The smart scientists imagined the distant planet

optative.english: I should imagine the amazing story

optative.georgian: შემოქმედებითმა მწერალმა ნათელი მომავალი უნდა წარმოიდგინოს
optative.english: The creative writer should imagine the bright future

optative.georgian: ჭკვიანმა მეცნიერებმა შორეული პლანეტა უნდა წარმოიდგინონ
optative.english: The smart scientists should imagine the distant planet

imperative.english: You all (you formal), imagine the new map
